On Windows or Linux:

Note: Currently an installation of MATLAB is required for some of the functions of cytoseg to work. In the future this dependency will be removed.

Installation Instructions (Windows):
  # Install [http://www.pythonxy.com pythonxy] with all options
  # Optional: Install [http://mlabwrap.sourceforge.net/ mlabwrap] which interfaces python to MATLAB
  # Download cytoseg from svn (see http://code.google.com/p/cytoseg/source/checkout)
  # To start the program, enter the following command from inside the cytoseg folder:
         {{{python main.py}}}

----
Installation Instructions (Ubuntu Linux, Instructions not yet complete)
  # Install the following modules with synaptic: python, python-numpy, python-wxgtk, python-scipy, python-opencv, python-matplotlib, python-tk
  # Visit http://code.enthought.com/projects/mayavi/docs/development/html/mayavi/installation.html to get the most recent version of mayavi2 and install it
  # Optional: Install [http://mlabwrap.sourceforge.net/ mlabwrap] which interfaces python to MATLAB
  # Download cytoseg from svn (see http://code.google.com/p/cytoseg/source/checkout)
  # To start the program, enter the following command from inside the cytoseg folder:
         {{{python main.py}}}
